sentences.en: Above: The little sushi bar is the soul of this restaurant.
sentences.cn: 上图: 小小的吧台,是这家餐厅的灵魂.

sentences.en: Careful, sushi , you will get us both killed.
sentences.cn: 小心, sushi, 你会害死我们俩的.

sentences.en: Don't you think we're a little bit past sushi at this point?
sentences.cn: 你不觉得我们的关系应该超过寿司了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dream imago was formed in Sushi's special life experience.
sentences.cn: 梦幻意象是苏轼在特殊的人生经历中形成的.

sentences.en: I tried both sushi and sashimi but I prefer sushi.
sentences.cn: 寿司和生鱼片我都吃了,但是我更喜欢吃寿司.

sentences.en: LL: All right , all right on. Let's go get some sushi tonight!
sentences.cn: 别这么 小气 好不好. 我们都好久 没 出去吃了,一次寿司肯定不会把你吃穷的.

sentences.en: Lydia : Marvellous! You know that newly - opened Sushi Bar at Taipei 101?
sentences.cn: 太棒了! 你知道台北101新开了一家寿司吧 吗 ?

sentences.en: No, I do not like sushi.
Sushi may not be traditional Christmas fare, but this Beluga seems keen.
sentences.cn: 寿司可能并不是圣诞节的传统食物, 但是这头白鲸却表现出对寿司的浓厚兴趣.

sentences.en: Sushi was fair , and honest when he was holding office at court.
sentences.cn: 苏轼在朝为官时清正廉洁.

sentences.en: Tepanyaki and Sushi Bar are the main spot to attract the guests.
sentences.cn: 以良好的日式铁板烧、寿司吧料理的出品形象,做好品牌经营.

sentences.en: The fresh vegetables in most sushi also have essential vitamins and minerals.
sentences.cn: 在多数寿司的新鲜蔬菜中也含有各种维生素和矿物质.

sentences.en: We try to point out the sources and manifestations of Sushi's pang.
sentences.cn: 文中分析了苏轼痛苦的来源,表现.

sentences.en: Well, my dream was to be a sushi chef.
sentences.cn: 而我的梦想是成为一名寿司主厨.

sentences.en: Whale skin eaten raw is something like Arctic sushi.
sentences.cn: 生吃的鲸鱼皮有点像是北极地区的生鱼片寿司.

sentences.en: What do steak, tofu and sushi have to do with cancer?
sentences.cn: 牛排, 豆腐和素食对癌症有什么影响?

trans.tran_en: a Japanese dish that consists of small cakes of cooked rice served with raw fish
